Class Raytracer.Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      • Raytracer.Color
  • Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    class Raytracer.Color
extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable
    Represents an RGB color parameter for the purposes of JSON serialization only. Internally, all colors represented as Vector3 objects.

      • toJSONObject

        public processing.data.JSONObject toJSONObject​()
        Description copied from class: Raytracer.JSONSerializable
        Serializes this object into a JSONObject. Stores the name of this class into the "type" entry of the JSONObject. Subclasses should override this method, call super.toJSONObject() to get a JSONObject, and then store all their necessary data into that.
        Overrides:
        toJSONObject in class Raytracer.JSONSerializable
        Returns:
        the JSONObject containing this object's data.
